title: Globo to Showcase Mobile “Apps That Matter” at Gartner Symposium/ITxpo 2015
text:
“The World’s Most Important Gathering of CIOs and Senior IT Executives”
What: Globo Plc (LSE-AIM: GBO, OTCQX: GOBPY), a global provider of complete solutions for the mobile enterprise, today announced the company will be showcasing its application development services and award-winning GO!Enterprise product suite at the Gartner Symposium/ITxpo 2015 in Orlando, Florida.
Consumer and business-to-business mobile apps are delivering billions of dollars in new business today, while employee-oriented apps are significantly improving operational efficiencies and workflows. They pay off exponentially when beautifully designed, carefully developed, and regularly maintained. Enterprise apps can grow revenue, increase productivity, reduce costs, and improve employee experience – in short, they become apps that matter .
Globo is helping the world’s leading brands create innovative mobile app experiences for their customers, employees, and partners. The company’s unique engagement model combines mobile expertise, deep industry insight, and a comprehensive set of app development and security products with one of the industry’s leading professional services organizations.
At the event, Globo will:
 - Share with attendees a new report entitled 5 New Rules for Building Apps That Matter - the best practices in mobile app development and deployment for building apps that drive user adoption, productivity, and revenue.
 - Explain how Globo provides companies with an innovative mobile application development platform (MADP) along with an award-winning enterprise mobility management (EMM) solution. Globo enables line-of-business manager to meet their objectives by offering the security, control, and compliance IT requires while providing the mobile productivity, freedom of choice, and user experience employees demand.
 - Reveal an exclusive special mobile app development offer to attendees, plus a custom “Apps are the New Bacon” t-shirt.
About Gartner Symposium/ITxpo: Gartner Symposium/ITxpo is the world's most important gathering of CIOs and senior IT executives. This event delivers independent and objective content with the authority and weight of the world's leading IT research and advisory organization, and provides access to the latest solutions from key technology providers. Gartner's annual Symposium/ITxpo events are key components of attendees' annual planning efforts. IT executives rely on Gartner Symposium/ITxpo to gain insight into how their organizations can use IT to address business challenges and improve operational efficiency. For more information, please visit www.gartner.com/us/symposium.
About Globo: Globo (GBO.L) (GOBPY) empowers the mobile enterprise by enabling employees to work and collaborate from anywhere, anytime and by extending the enterprise’s engagement with customers and partners. Globo is unique in offering a complete enterprise mobility solution by merging Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM), Mobile Application Development Platform (MADP) and professional services. Globo solutions cover critical areas for a “Mobile First” enterprise, which are data security, app and device management as well as app design and development. The Group operates internationally in USA, Europe, Middle East and South East Asia, and has achieved worldwide recognition from leading analysts firms like Gartner, IDC and OVUM. For more information visit www.globoplc.com.
When: October 4 - 8, 2015
Where: Walt Disney World Dolphin, Walt Disney World Swan, Disney's Yacht and Beach Club Resorts and Disney's Boardwalk
 Booth # 114
 Orlando, FL
